articles.title: Wall Street rally pauses as big tech loses steam - Reuters
articles.description: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq edged slightly lower on Wednesday as big tech stocks slid amid an ongoing rotation of portfolio holdings that gave a boost to energy shares and kept the overall market near record highs.

articles.author: Chauncey Alcorn, CNN Business
articles.title: Aunt Jemima finally has a new name - CNN
articles.description: Quaker Oats is releasing a new name and logo for its "Aunt Jemima" products, finally retiring the racist stereotype that has adorned its pancake mixes and syrups for decades.
